Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Fillmore
ShortDescription: 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, 16th, Central, Roosevelt, and Austin due to street blockage near Austin/Fillmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, 16th, Central, Roosevelt, and Austin due to street blockage near Austin/Fillmore.

Allow extra travel time.
